md:
giải nghĩa từ "clocks" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

clocks /klɔks/ (noun)

* Meaning: a device that shows the time, usually with hour and minute hands
* Type: noun
* Example sentence: "I need to set my clocks to the correct time."
* Related words: clock, time, watch, hour, minute

clocks /klɔks/ (verb)

* Meaning: to measure the time taken by someone or something to do something
* Type: verb
* Example sentence: "The athlete was clocked at 10 seconds in the 100-meter dash."
* Related words: clock, time, speed, record, pace
